content: Singaporean politician **Abdul Aziz Karim** is a Singaporean politician who had served as a Member of Parliament representing [Kallang](/wiki/Kallang_Single_Member_Constituency) from 1968-1976. He was a member of the [People's Action Party](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party). ## Early Life and Career Abdul Aziz Karim was educated in [Victoria School](/wiki/Victoria_School) and was the Vice President of the [National Trades Union Congress](/wiki/National_Trades_Union_Congress). This article about a politician from Singapore is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Abdul Aziz Karim
